unnormalised: Big news for folks looking to invest in real estate! A new project, "Sunshine Apartments," is launching near Powai Lake, Mumbai. The brochure says they've got 2BHKs starting at Rs. 1.5 Cr. Not bad, eh?
normalised: Big news for folks looking to invest in real estate! A new project, "Sunshine Apartments," is launching near Powai Lake, Mumbai. The brochure says they've got two B H K s starting at rupee one point five crore. Not bad, eh?

unnormalised: Apparently, the developer, "Shanti Builders," is offering pre-launch discounts if you book before 30/06/2024. Their site address is listed as Unit 201, Building A, Hiranandani Gardens, Powai. Pin code: 400076. It’s supposedly close to the IIT Bombay campus.
normalised: Apparently, the developer, "Shanti Builders," is offering pre-launch discounts if you book before thirtieth june two thousand and twenty four. Their site address is listed as Unit two hundred and one, Building A, Hiranandani Gardens, Powai. Pin code: four double zero double zero seven six. It’s supposedly close to the I I T Bombay campus.

unnormalised: Word on the street is, though, to double-check all the paperwork before you put down any booking amount. "Shanti Builders" contact number is mentioned as +91-22-12345678 on some online ads. Better to be safe than sorry, bhai!
normalised: Word on the street is, though, to double-check all the paperwork before you put down any booking amount. "Shanti Builders" contact number is mentioned as plus ninety one hyphen twenty two hyphen one two three four five six seven eight on some online ads. Better to be safe than sorry, bhai!
